name: The Tragic Death Of Charlie Tick
name_original: The Tragic Death Of Charlie Tick
description:
Charlie TicF : k just died and his troubled soul wants us to find out what really happened. In this top down 2D game we rewind about 2 minutes back in time and hopefully reveals the Tragic Death Of Charlie Tick.

This is out first game, so it would mean a lot if you downloaded and played the game.

The game was originally made in 1 week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

This game was made by Valtin (me) and KalleManuel (https://itch.io/profile/kallemanuel).

I know that the camera is very slow, I guess did it by mistake right before i built it. But when the jam has ended, om going to update the game.

Controls:

F : Open Doors

Control : Crouch

WASD or ARROWS : Movement
